text: ثُمَّ بَعَثۡنَٰهُمۡ لِنَعۡلَمَ أَيُّ ٱلۡحِزۡبَيۡنِ أَحۡصَىٰ لِمَا لَبِثُوٓاْ أَمَدٗا

translation.en: Then We awakened them that We might show which of the two factions was most precise in calculating what [extent] they had remained in time
translation.id: (kemudian Kami bangunkan mereka, agar Kami mengetahui manakah di antara ke dua golongan itu487) yang lebih tepat dalam menghitung berapa lamanya mereka tinggal (dalam gua itu)
